data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Páll-Gergely, Barna, Fehér, Zoltán, Hunyadi, András, Asami, Takahiro (2015): Revision of the genus Pseudopomatias and its relatives (Gastropoda: Cyclophoroidea: Pupinidae). Zootaxa 3937 (1): 1-49, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3937.1.1
